attributes.action: Provide cost of living payment for new UC claimants
attributes.additional_details:
I made several reclaims on UC.
There was delay with UC assessment period therefore I received my UC late but didn't receive cost of living payment.
I want others to be eligible for the cost of living payment for those who've joined UC or making a reclaim. This will provide extra support.
attributes.background: Change assessment period for UC for June and later. UC claimaints who've joined will be entitled for the cost of living payment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  People entitled to UC at the time of the first cost of living payment are still entitled to receive it. You can read more here

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/cost-of-living-payment

Dates for eligibility for the second payment haven't been announced.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
